o:MethodTargetItem.a:Name: mdde_BasePackage_OpenAllModels
o:MethodTargetItem.a:Creator: HarmenWessels
o:MethodTargetItem.a:MethodScript:
Sub %Method%(obj) OpenAllModels(obj) End Sub
Sub OpenAllModels(ByRef objBasePackage) WriteDebug("Opening models in " & objBasePackage.Name & " folder")
Dim objFolder For Each objFolder In objBasePackage.Children If objFolder.ObjectType = "ProjectFolder" Then OpenAllModels(objFolder) End If Next
Dim objModel For Each objModel in objBasePackage.ModelDocuments ' Check whether the referenced model inside the project, it is a model file and it isn't loaded yet (TargetModelObject is Nothing). If (objModel.InsideProject) And (objModel.ModelClassKind = PdLDM.cls_Model) And (objModel.TargetModelObject Is Nothing) Then WriteDebug "Opening model " & objModel.Name ' Open the model. If Not(objModel.OpenDocument()) Then WriteError "Error while opening model " & objModel.Name End If End If Next End Sub
